1: Migrant Smuggling in the Horn of Africa and Yemen
2: Mixed Migration flows in Kenya
3: Responses (government and non-state actors) to Mixed Migration in the Horn of Africa and Yemen
4: Western Movement: Scale and Nature of Mixed Migration from the Horn of Africa (mainly Eritrea, Somalia) through Sudan to Libya and Europe
5: Mixed Migration and Saudi Arabia: understanding regular and irregular migration in a context of rapid change. 
6: Study on Knowledge, Attitudes and Practices (KAP) of Ethiopian migrants to and through Yemen, specific focus on protection risks and migration drivers (writing the final report, based on survey results)
7: Discussion paper: What if existing migration policy and laws in the Horn of Africa and Yemen were actually implemented and enforced? 
8: Study on Immigration Detention in East & Horn of Africa 
9: Study on Migration and Development in the East and Horn of Africa', 'title': 'Senior Research Associate', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Independent Consultancy', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nairobi, Kenya', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Independent Consultancy', 'description': "Independent consultant in migration research and evaluation, based in Nairobi, Kenya. Before that I worked as a senior policy researcher and project manager at Panteia/Research voor Beleid in the Netherlands. I have extensive experience in policy research, consultancy and evaluation. Main areas of expertise are (labour) migration, migrant smuggling and human trafficking, migration and development, integration, diversity and employment. Some examples of projects I worked on:
- Baseline Assessment for a digital remittance booklet to inform Kenyan diaspora (for IOM / ACP EU Migration Action).
- Supporting UNICEF Kenya, Ethiopia, Somalia, South Sudan and Uganda country offices on strategies to reach mobile populations with polio vaccination
- Study on Migration and Development in the East and Horn of Africa 
- Assessment study on maritime movement/mixed migration/human trafficking of Rohingya from Myanmar and Bangladesh to Malaysia
- Literature study on migrant smuggling and human trafficking along the Southern route from East Africa and the Horn towards Southern Africa 
- Consultancy / Technical Assistance on Mixed Migration / Mobile Populations to support polio vaccination (UNICEF Kenya, Ethiopia and Somalia)
- Study on Immigration Detention in East & Horn of Africa region
- Study on Knowledge, Attitudes and Practices (KAP) of Ethiopians migrating to and through Yemen
- Study on the scale and nature of mixed migration from the Horn of Africa (mainly Eritrea, Somalia) through Sudan to Libya and Europe 
- Mixed Migration to Saudi Arabia
- Responses to mixed migration in the Horn of Africa, Yemen, Israel, Saudi Arabia, South Sudan, Sudan, Uganda & Tanzania
- Study on Mixed Migration in Kenya 
- Study on Migrant Smuggling in the Horn of Africa & Yemen 
- External evaluation ILO's approach to global labour migration (International Labour Organization)
- Evaluation of Dutch international Migration and Development policy (Ministry of Foreign Affairs)", 'title': 'Independent Consultant in migration research and evaluations', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 4881, 'name': 'UNICEF', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQE5WFsvU5iicw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856174357?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wv1Nid09MpsBciWzz6p9fKkTtwXG7NiyQ_Wegdl7y1M', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unicef/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'East Africa', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'UNICEF', 'description': '- Supporting UNICEF Kenya, Ethiopia, Somalia, South Sudan and Uganda country offices on strategies to reach migrant and other mobile populations (especially nomadic pastoralists) with polio vaccination

- Evaluation of the Dutch international Migration and Development policy (Ministry of Foreign Affairs)
 -  Study on Labour market integration of migrants in 15 European counties (European Commission, DG EMPL)
 - Evaluation sustainable return of former asylum-seekers and re-integration in their countries of origin (Ministry of Foreign Affairs)
 - Scenario study on future migration to and from the Netherlands (Ministry of the Interior)
- Illegal employment 
- Organization of Knowledge exchange on civic integration and forced marriages (Ministry of the Interior and Kingdom Relations)
- Pre-study for the Migration and Development Evaluation (Ministry of Foreign Affairs)
- Study on Labour market integration non-western migrants (Ministry of Social Affairs and Employment)
- Study on Labour migration and illegal employment (Ministry of Social Affairs and Employment)
- Study on Cooperation with diaspora organizations in fighting honour related violence (Ministry of Housing, Communities and Integration)
